title: Shore Excursion: 2-Day The Best of Lima from Callao Port
description: Get a well-rounded view of Peru on this 2-day tour around its capital. Take a tour of the historic city center and learn about the ‘City of Kings’ from your guide and then head to the Larco Museum and observe artifacts from pre-Inca times. On the next day get a closer look at Peru’s colorful culture and delectable cuisine on a tour around the local hotspots and hidden gems.
all_descriptions: Get a well-rounded view of Peru on this 2-day tour around its capital. Take a tour of the historic city center and learn about the ‘City of Kings’ from your guide and then head to the Larco Museum and observe artifacts from pre-Inca times. On the next day get a closer look at Peru’s colorful culture and delectable cuisine on a tour around the local hotspots and hidden gems.

reviews.title: Thank you to Haku Tours - the Best Experience
reviews.text: We did two separate one day excursions with Haku Tours in Lima on 1 and 2 September 2025.  We did them both with a guide and driver.  We deliberately chose a personal tour when we visited as part of a cruise and, while the cost is higher, we had an excellent experience.  We were picked up and driven everywhere in comfort.  We had one to one interaction for the whole day and we learned so much.  We could modify times and (for a very small extra cost) even our itinerary.  Everything was just perfect.  The guide and driver were both helpful and informative and very attentive to our needs.  Definitely a 10!

reviews.title: Visit Lima
reviews.text: It was a wonderful excursion . Got to know a little more of the real Lima. I will recommend it for anyone with 2 days in Lima.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: What a great two day tour we had with Haku tours. Day one was led by Amadeo, our guide and Julio, our driver. during which and despite the heavy traffic, we managed to visit all the sites on the advertised itinerary. We enjoyed a lovely lunch and a light evening meal and at no point did we feel rushed. Amadeo was informative, helpful and very friendly throughout and is a credit to the company.For the second day of the tour, Cesar was our guide and Louis, our driver. Louis negotiated the traffic with ease and Cesar managed our visit to the shanty town with great sensitivity and insight. His compassion and respect for the local population was evident throughout and we couldn’t help but enjoy his enthusiasm for all things ‘Peru’. Time management by both guides was excellent and we’d recommend this tour and this company without hesitation.

reviews.title: Great tour and local foods
reviews.text: Our tour guide Leonardo is very knowledgeable and passionate young man. We really enjoyed our time we spend in Lima. Amazing local foods this tour company took us for lunch and dinner.

reviews.title: Unforgettable 2-Day Lima Tour with Haku Tours – A Must-Do!
reviews.text: We had an incredible 2-day city tour with Haku Tours, and I cannot recommend them enough! From start to finish, their organization, passion, and commitment to the local community made this an unforgettable experience.Our guide, Leonardo, was hands down the best guide we’ve ever had! He’s a historian, a storyteller, and an educator, and he made every site we visited come alive. Ask for Leonardo—you won’t regret it! He even travels over 2.5 hours each way to meet the tour group, and his dedication to sharing Lima’s history and culture is unmatched.Day 1: Pachacamac Ruins, Old Lima & Magic Water ShowWe started early and made our way to the Pachacamac archaeological site, where we explored the fascinating ruins of this pre-Incan and Incan religious center. Leonardo’s deep knowledge of the Inca civilization and their customs gave us a whole new appreciation for Peru’s rich history.Lunch was a highlight—authentic Peruvian cuisine at a local restaurant where I had my first Pisco Sour (and loved it!).In Lima’s historic center, we visited:✔️ Plaza Mayor and the Government Palace✔️ San Martín Square✔️ San Francisco Church and Catacombs—still an active monastery!The catacombs tour was fascinating, and Leonardo made sure we understood their historical and cultural significance.To end the night, we visited Parque de la Reserva to see the Magic Water Circuit, a breathtaking light and water show that tells the history of Peru. This was an amazing way to wrap up the day before heading back to the ship.Day 2: Shanty Town Tour & Local Market ExperienceThis was one of the most eye-opening and moving experiences we’ve ever had while traveling. Haku Tours has special permission to visit a shanty town, allowing us to see the real Lima beyond the tourist sites.We met the community leader, an extraordinary woman who has dedicated her life to improving the lives of others. Her accomplishments left us speechless:✔️ Drove drug dealers out of the area✔️ Runs a soup kitchen feeding 1,000 people daily✔️ Opened a daycare so parents can work✔️ Started a school for women and adults✔️ Fought for infrastructure improvements like roads and staircases✔️ Secured a donation from the Taiwanese ambassador to help feed the communityHer story of resilience and leadership was truly inspiring.Afterward, we visited a vertical market, where Leonardo introduced us to Peru’s incredible variety of fruits and vegetables. This was a great way to experience local life and cuisine.Why Choose Haku Tours?✅ Non-Profit Company – Proceeds support local communities✅ Small Group Tours – More personalized experience✅ Expert Guides – Leonardo was absolutely amazing!✅ Unique & Authentic Experiences – Go beyond the usual tourist spotsWe returned to the ship feeling like we had truly experienced Lima, not just as visitors, but as guests welcomed into the community.If you’re visiting Lima, Haku Tours is the BEST choice! Book with them—you won’t regret it!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Highly Recommend!#HakuTours #BestTourInLima #TravelWithPurpose #LimaPeru #Pachacamac #ShantyTownTour #LocalExperience #LeonardoTheBest #SupportNonProfits

reviews.title: Two unforgettable days in Lima
reviews.text: Amadeo was an excellent guide. He made a point of getting to know us.  He was very knowledgeable and had interesting anecdotes to add to the tour.  Highly recommended- best tour by far.

reviews.title: Unforgettable Lima
reviews.text: Our eyes were opened in Lima - so much to see, do and enjoy here. We were fabulously looked after on our Haku Tour, & our guide was skilled & knowledgeable. He was able to be flexible and adjust the tour to fit with what we, as a group, enjoyed. Going with him to the shantytown was our highlight of the two days, and we were privileged to go. Buying food and other necessities in the market to pass on to people there was an extra that our group wanted to do, and chipped in for - it was such a pleasure. Meeting the fabulous women at their soup kitchen was also amazing, and giving them fresh chicken and eggs for their cooking. I have travelled much in my life, and this tour was right up there for me. Thank you Haku Tours!

reviews.title: Best of Lima Tour
reviews.text: What an amazing & thorough tour of Lima. Our guide Cesar was informative, entertaining, a ball of energy and extremely interesting. He really went over and above to ensure we had an enjoyable tour and shared his love of Lima with us. We booked a 2 day tour and our pick up was precise & meeting point very convenient. The tour bus was very comfortable & easy to access. On Day 1 we went to Pachacmac archaeological site. The length of time spent here was perfect and Cesar had a thorough knowledge of the area & sites. We then had a Peruvian lunch (included in the price) at a small, vibrant restaurant. After lunch, we returned to Lima for a walking tour of the main sites, the catacombs & were even invited to join the locals in a traditional dance. Dinner at a restaurant was also included (Cesar actually ran across the road & bought me a lemonade as the restaurant had run out) . We were then driven to the Magic Water Circuit & afterwards, Cesar took us around the many fountains within the park. Day 2 was a visit to a local market, fruit tasting & a visit to a shanty town. We were only in Lima for 2 days on a cruise ship, but came away seeing so many sights and such a wonderful knowledge of Lima - thanks to our extraordinary guide, Cesar. I would HIGHLY recommend this tour. It is such great value for money, we spent a good time at each site & provided so many memorable experiences. This tour was a real highlight of our whole world cruise.

reviews.title: Brilliant and Professional  Tour Company
reviews.text: I booked our tour from Australia as I felt there was more to offer in Lima than the cruise ship tours. This was the best decision. The tour guides were professional, knowledgeable, caring and friendly. Thank you lovely ladies,  Pamela and Lydia, also thank you to the young man who took us to lunch.We took the ships shuttle bus to Larcomar Shopping Centre in Miraflores and Haku Tours were waiting for us. The communication the day before  was excellent by Whatsapp. Email is also available. I was given  the tour guides phone numbers therefore no stress.The company  also contributes/ donations to the Shanty  Town people.  I am very grateful  we visited Shanty Town. Thank you to everyone who works for Haku Tours.

reviews.title: Best Lima Tour
reviews.text: One of the best tours we have been on. The tour guide was fun, informative and enthusiastic to show us his country. Highly recommended this tour
